name: Don't Rage (B4Rabbit)
description:
Hello there,

Don't Rage is a 2d sidescroller rage game in which you will die over and over again.

This is my first game. I created this game in the past 6 months to learn unreal engine see if I like game development.

I hope you will enjoy it as much as I did while developing.

Key features:

- Free movement

- Rage

- Platforming

- More Rage

Links:

Youtube

Don't forget to rate the game and leave a comment!
